content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operation at (-15, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (24.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest at position (23.5, -16.5) for coal storage

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (-14.0, 23.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-14.5, 21.5) for iron ore storage

### Iron Smelting Area at (-10, 20)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (-11.0, 20.0)
- Stone furnace at position (-9.0, 20.0)

### Copper Processing Complex at (22, 20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (20.0, 20.0)
- Wooden chest at position (20.5, 21.5) for copper ore storage
- Stone furnace at position (24.0, 20.0)
- Wooden chest at position (24.5, 17.5) for copper plate storage
- Burner inserter at position (24.5, 18.5) moving items between furnace and storage
- Burner inserter at position (22.5, 20.5) oriented right
- Burner inserter at position (20.5, 22.5) moving items to/from chest

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Belt Connections
- Cannot connect belts directly from chests - use inserters as intermediaries
- When connecting entities with belts, ensure the path between start and end positions is clear and valid
- Belt connections need proper alignment between source and destination points

### Entity Status Issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel - ensure fuel supply is maintained
- Furnaces have no ingredients to smelt - set up proper input logistics
- Some furnaces show "furnace fuel source is full" warning - this is expected when fuel capacity is reached
